document.title: NI 43-101 Technical Report (PEA) for the Tepal Project in North America dated 2017.pdf
document.description: A technical report documenting the preliminary economic assessment for the Tepal Project in Michoacán, Mexico, including revised process flows, mining costs, and updated capital and operating cost estimates.
